727228f-a.title: Queens: Liberty Avenue - 121st Street
727228f-a.text:
Liberty Ave., at the N.W. corner of 121st Street, showing the
Martin G. Johnson house. John Johnson of Flatbush purchased the farm
upon which this house stands in 1744. His son was Martin whose son
was George. Robert Johnson, another son of John Johnson, removed to
Wallabout. He was the father of Gen'1. Jeremiah Johnson. Mrs. Isaac
Cornell Remsen nee Georgiana J. Ditmars, Was a neice of M. G. Johnson,
and with her husband moved to this farm subsequent to 1882.
1922.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
